title: Espers Discography (MP3) (192) (2004 - 2009)
description:
Espers is a Philadelphia folk band formed in 2002. They play songs from a wide range of composers from classic folksongs like 'Rosemary Lane' to rock covers like Blue Ã–yster Cult's 'Flaming telepaths' (both songs from The Weed Tree album).

They sound sometimes warming, sometimes deep and powerful but always enjoyable.

We have a really talent folks' over here.
